data.current_description: This resource allows searching sounds in Freesound by matching their tags and other kinds of metadata.
data.summary_suggestion: Search sounds by tags and metadata
data.description_suggestion: Search the Freesound library for sounds by matching against tags, metadata, and other sound attributes. Supports multiple query parameters for filtering results including text queries, tags, duration, and other criteria. Returns a paginated list of matching sounds with their metadata. Use this operation to discover sounds matching specific characteristics or search terms.
data.reasoning: Original summary 'Search sounds' is too generic. Description lacks detail about input parameters, filtering capabilities, and output format. Enhanced version specifies search criteria (tags, metadata), mentions pagination, and clarifies use cases for AI agents to understand when to invoke this operation.

message: Operation 'getSoundById' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary 'Details of a sound' is vague and not action-oriented. Description lacks specificity about required input (soundId parameter) and what information is returned. Enhanced version clarifies the required parameter, specifies the types of metadata returned, and provides context for when an AI agent should use this operation.

data.current_description: This resource allows the retrieval of detailed information about a sound.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve detailed sound information by ID
data.description_suggestion: Retrieve comprehensive details about a specific sound by its unique identifier (soundId). Returns complete sound metadata including audio properties, tags, user information, ratings, and other descriptive information. Use this operation when you need full details about a particular sound after discovering it through search or to access sound-specific information.
data.reasoning: Original summary 'Details of a sound' is vague and not action-oriented. Description lacks specificity about required input (soundId parameter) and what information is returned.
